        Requests the balance of the account associated with this clients' API key
        Returns:
        An AccountBalance object containing the balances
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getNewAddress

        public NewAddress getNewAddress(java.lang.String label)
                         throws BlockIOException
        Requests the creation of a new address for the account associated with the clients' API key
        Parameters:
        label - Optional label for the new address. null or "" for random label
        Returns:
        A NewAddress object containing information about the new address
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getAddressBalancesByAddress

        public AddressBalances getAddressBalancesByAddress(java.lang.String[] addresses)
                                            throws BlockIOException
        Requests balance(s) of given address(es) in the account associated with this clients' API key
        Make sure that the addresses actually exist in the account or the whole call will fail
        Parameters:
        addresses - A String array containing the addresses to request balances for
        Returns:
        An AddressBalances object containing the balances
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getAddressBalancesByLabels

        public AddressBalances getAddressBalancesByLabels(java.lang.String[] labels)
                                           throws BlockIOException
        Requests balance(s) of given label(s) in the account associated with this clients' API key
        Make sure that the labels actually exist in the account or the whole call will fail
        Parameters:
        labels - A String array containing the labels to request balances for
        Returns:
        An AddressBalances object containing the balances
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getAddressByLabel

        public AddressByLabel getAddressByLabel(java.lang.String label)
                                 throws BlockIOException
        Requests the address with the given label from the account associated with this clients' API key
        Parameters:
        label - The label for which to request the address for
        Returns:
        An AddressByLabel object containing the address and additional info about it
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • withdrawToAddress

        public Withdrawal withdrawToAddress(java.lang.String address,
                           double amount,
                           java.lang.String secretPin)
                             throws BlockIOException
        Convenience method for a simple withdrawal from the account associated with this clients' API key to the specified address
        Parameters:
        address - Target address
        amount - Amount to withdraw
        secretPin - The secret PIN you set at block.io to authorize and sign the withdrawal
        Returns:
        A Withdrawal object containing information about the sent transaction.
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • withdraw

        public Withdrawal withdraw(java.lang.String[] sources,
                  io.block.api.BlockIO.ParamType sourceType,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> targetsAndAmounts,
                  io.block.api.BlockIO.ParamType targetType,
                  java.lang.String secretPin)
                    throws BlockIOException
        Withdraw from the account associated with this clients' API key.
        Parameters:
        sources - Supply an array of sources for this withdrawal. If you set this to null, then block.io will select the sources automatically. You must not mix source types!
        sourceType - If you supplied a sources array, this is mandatory. Must be one of BlockIO.ParamType.
        targetsAndAmounts - A Map with target as key (String) and amount as value (Double). Each entry will be one target of the withdrawal. Limit is 100 per withdrawal. You must not mix target types!
        targetType - This is mandatory and defines what type of targets this withdrawal goes to. One of BlockIO.ParamType.
        secretPin - The secret PIN you set at block.io to authorize and sign the withdrawal
        Returns:
        A Withdrawal object containing information about the sent transaction.
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getPrices

        public Prices getPrices(java.lang.String baseCurrency)
                 throws BlockIOException
        Requests prices of the currency of the account associated with this clients' API key
        Parameters:
        baseCurrency - Optional base currency to return prices in. null or "" to get prices in all available base currencies
        Returns:
        A Prices object containing price information in one or more base currency from one or more exchange
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • isGreenAddress

        public GreenAddresses isGreenAddress(java.lang.String[] addresses)
                              throws BlockIOException
        Checks the given address(es) for being Block.io Green Address(es)
        Parameters:
        addresses - A String array containing the addresses to request status for
        Returns:
        An GreenAddresses object containing the subset of the given addresses that are green
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • isGreenTransaction

        public GreenTransactions isGreenTransaction(java.lang.String[] txIDs)
                                     throws BlockIOException
        Checks the given transaction(s) for being sent by a Block.io Green Address
        Returns:
        An GreenTransactions object containing the subset of the given transactions that are green
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getTransactionsReceived

        public TransactionsReceived getTransactionsReceived(java.lang.String beforeTX)
                                             throws BlockIOException
        Lists up to 100 of the last transactions received by the account associated with this clients' API key
        Parameters:
        beforeTX - An optional transaction ID used as upper bound of the requested transactions. Use this to request more than 100 of the last transactions
        Returns:
        A TransactionsReceived object containing the list of received transactions
        Throws:
        BlockIOException

      • getTransactionsReceivedByAddress

        public TransactionsReceived getTransactionsReceivedByAddress(java.lang.String[] addresses,
                                                    java.lang.String beforeTX)
                                                      throws BlockIOException
        Lists up to 100 of the last transactions received by the provided addresses of the account associated with this clients' API key
        Parameters:
        addresses - A String array containing the addresses to request transactions for
        beforeTX - An optional transaction ID used as upper bound of the requested transactions. Use this to request more than 100 of the last transactions
        Returns:
        A TransactionsReceived object containing the list of received transactions
        Throws:
        BlockIOException
